mapper.select: select humor_b_num, subject, content, id, hits, likes, wdate from humor_board where humor_b_num=#{num}
mapper.insert: insert into humor_board values( humor_board_seq.nextval, #{subject}, #{content}, #{id}, #{hits}, #{likes}, sysdate )
mapper.update: update humor_board set hits= hits+1 where humor_b_num=#{num}
mapper.select: select * from(select rownum rn, a.* from(select humor_b_num, subject, content, id, hits, likes, wdate from humor_board where subject like '%'||#{keyword}||'%' or content like '%'||#{keyword}||'%' order by humor_b_num desc) a ) where rn between #{start} and #{end}
select count(humor_b_num) cnt from humor_board where subject like '%'||#{keyword}||'%'
mapper.insert: insert into humor_board_reply values( humor_board_reply_seq.nextval, #{ArticleNum}, #{id}, #{content}, sysdate )
mapper.select: select humor_b_r_num, humor_b_num, id, content, wdate from humor_board_reply where humor_b_num=#{num}
select count(humor_b_num) from humor_board_reply where humor_b_num = #{num}
